title: [Placements] What does blank in Job offers mean?
content: So I was seeing the placements info of ece 2025, I came across many (most) of the companies has compensations but only a few had job offers, what does the blank mean? Do they tell the salary before even giving them a job offer? Did no one get the offer?

comments.body:
Blank means no offers - that is the owner either does not know how many got selected or company never released number of recruited students 

yes, they mention package in the JD mail itself, generally.
So the recruitment has happened buy we just dont know how many?
